description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Spectre Divide, including the M18 Drummer shotgun, the M10 Brat, and the Berserker RB3.

00:00 - Opening
00:41 - SHIV
01:44 - M10 BRAT 
02:42 - M25 HORNET
03:23 - DUSTER RX6
04:39 - HARPE
05:35 - BUZZSAW RT40
06:12 - TRIDENT
07:24 - CYCLONE
09:28 - M18 DRUMMER
10:36 - BERSERKER RB3
12:02 - TEMPEST
13:04 - CRUSADER
14:08 - BLACKOUT
16:08 - PROTOTYPE-OP

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries--breaks down the guns of Spectre Divide and compares them to their potential real-life counterparts.

Firearms Expert Reacts playlist - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4T78VQoWUs&list=PLpg6WLs8kxGMgYb13XjPgOKbm5O-CDq7R

If you're interested in seeing more of Jonathan's work, you can check out more from the Royal Armouries right here. - https://www.youtube.com
title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Spectre Divide’s Guns
